parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Type of document as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: SelectionType
parameters.description: Type of object as defined in swSelectType_e

title: IFlyoutGroup.AddContextMenuFlyout
description: Adds this flyout to the context menus of the specified documents and selections.
signature:
System.Boolean AddContextMenuFlyout( 
   System.Int32
DocumentType
,
   System.Int32
SelectionType
)

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Type of document as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: SelectionType
parameters.description: Type of object as defined in swSelectType_e

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Call this method once for each set of DocumentType and SelectionType parameters.
Context-sensitive menus support only the standard flyout style (
swCommandFlyoutStyle_e
.swCommandFlyoutStyle_Simple), in which there is no immediate action on the main flyout button.
